meanings.definition: A tax or land rent paid by a freeholder in lieu of services or other obligations.
meanings.sent1: The quitrents were due at the end of each month.
meanings.sent2: The landlord collected the quitrents from all the tenants.
meanings.sent3: The quitrents danced around the idea of being paid on time.
meanings.sent4: The quitrents hung over the land like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: Paying the quitrents was as unavoidable as the changing seasons.

meanings.definition: A fixed rent paid by a tenant in lieu of services or other obligations.
meanings.sent1: She budgeted carefully to ensure she could pay the quitrents.
meanings.sent2: The quitrents were clearly stated in the rental agreement.
meanings.sent3: The quitrents whispered tales of financial responsibility.
meanings.sent4: The quitrents weighed heavily on the tenant's mind.
meanings.sent5: The quitrents were a constant reminder of the cost of living in the city.
